text: The Wright Liberator was a single-decker body of a bus. It had a low-floor. It was made from 1996 to 1999 by Wrightbus. The Wright Liberator body was built on the Volvo B10L chassis. In 1999, The Liberator was replaced with the Volvo B10BLE with Wright Renown bodywork. == Operators == In 1996, First Greater Manchester ordered 5 Volvo B10Ls with Wright Liberator bodywork. From 1996 to 1999, Travel Dundee and Travel West Midlands ordered over 100 Wright Liberators.
